code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{useCart}from'../context/CartContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductCard=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useCart();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{border:'1px solid #ddd',padding:'15px',borderRadius:'8px',margin:'10px',maxWidth:'300px',backgroundColor:'white',boxShadow:'0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{style:{marginTop:0,marginBottom:'10px',color:'#2c3e50'},children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{backgroundColor:'#f8f9fa',padding:'5px 10px',borderRadius:'4px',display:'inline-block',marginBottom:'10px'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:'#3498db',fontSize:'0.9rem',fontWeight:'bold'},children:product.category})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{margin:'15px 0'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{style:{color:'#7f8c8d',fontSize:'0.9rem',marginBottom:'5px'},children:["SKU: ",product.sku]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{style:{color:'#e74c3c',fontWeight:'bold',fontSize:'1.3rem',margin:'10px 0'}})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{display:'flex',gap:'10px',marginTop:'15px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),style:{background:'#3498db',color:'white',border:'none',padding:'10px 16px',borderRadius:'4px',cursor:'pointer',flex:1,fontWeight:'bold'},children:"A\xF1adir al carrito"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:'/product/'+product.id,style:{flex:1,textDecoration:'none'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{style:{background:'#2ecc71',color:'white',border:'none',padding:'10px 16px',borderRadius:'4px',cursor:'pointer',width:'100%',fontWeight:'bold'},children:"Ver detalles"})})]})]});};export default ProductCard;
